price: Ин [ҳамон] ҷаҳаннаме аст, ки гунаҳкорон инкораш мекарданд
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
